1.00.name: wordpress/share-and-get-it
1.00.description:
Share&Get it ! automatically provides you with either Facebook fans or Twitter followers in return for downloadable files. Once you’ve installed Share&Get it ! on your WordPress website, your number of visitors will dramatically increase in no time. To obtain such great results, you only need to copy/paste the shortcodes you get when setting up the buttons.

Those buttons enable you to share any type of content from music, photos, videos, wallpapers to Ebooks, software, tutorials, icons, Web resources and so much more.

It’s now time for you to do the maths: One download = One new Facebook fan or One new Twitter follower

Easy translation made possible

Share&Get it ! is a piece of cake to translate! Our built-in files help you get the job done.

Submit your .po files for translations @ http://tweetandgetit.com/translation

Fea
